modName: Bogvars Tomb now with a Quest
summary: My first attempt at creating a dungeon on skyrim
descriptionHtml:
*NEW*
A fully functioning quest with a few new npc\'s, reward and small storyline

Description:
Adds a dungeon to skyrim that contains draugrs, bandits, trolls, nordic catacombs, cave areas, nordic ruins and several leveled loot chests. Its currently still in the making, fully functional but there might be some bugs so just let me know if you find any I will do my best to fix them (still getting a hang of the creation kit). 

Changelog:
v2.1-Fixed some of the dialogue when returning to Booger
v2.0-Added a quest let me know if there are any bugs
v1.2-Fixed the lights
v1.1-Fixed some minore bugs 

Quest Location:
-South of Solitude
-Look for a \"Curious Shack\"

Location of the Tomb:
-South of Solitude
-Northwest of Dead Man\'s Respite

Installation:
-Just extract the contents of the .rar into your skyrim data folder

Plans for the future:
-More clutter giving it more of a \"real\" feel

Know issues:
-Any mods editing meeko\'s shack will cause issues
-Possibly some see through walls (I\'m pretty sure the problem is resolved)
author: mydogmax28

files.name: bogvarstomb v1 1
files.changelogHtml: Just fixed some of the minor bugs
